navigation.signup: Don't have an account? Sign Up

ServerError.title: Unexpected Server Error
ServerError.description:
An error has occurred and 
we're working to fix the problem! 
If you need immediate help, please contact us.
 If it isn't urgent matter, please try again later.

TimeoutError.title: Network Error
TimeoutError.description:
The connection has timed out.
Please check your internet connection
and please try again later.

validation.alphaNumeric: {{ field }} must contain only alphanumeric characters.
validation.includeLowercase: {{ field }} must contain at least 1 lowercase character.
validation.includeUppercase: {{ field }} must contain at least 1 uppercase character.
validation.includeNumber: {{ field }} must contain at least 1 numeric character.
validation.includeSpecialCharacter: {{ field }} must contain at least 1 special character.
validation.isNumber: {{ field }} should be a number value.
validation.isUnique: This {{ field }} is already in use.
validation.lengthGreaterThanEqual: {{ field }} must contain at least {{ length }} characters.
validation.maximum: The maximum value of {{ field }} is {{ maximum }}.
validation.maxDeposit: Max Deposit should be at least Min Deposit.
validation.minimum: The minimum value of {{ field }} is {{ minimum }}.
validation.minDeposit: Min Deposit should be at most Max Deposit.
validation.noUpperCaseCharacters: {{ field }} must not contain uppercase characters.
validation.noSpecifiedCharacter: {{ characters }} are not allowed in {{ field }}.
validation.notExceedBalance: {{ field }} exceeds the balance of the {{ target }}
validation.onlyCharacters: {{ field }} must contain only alphabet characters.
validation.passwordEqualToConfirm: Password and Confirm Password are not match.
validation.validInviter: The inviter is not active or not authorized to invite.
validation.validAddress: {{ field }} must not contain invalid symbols.
validation.400-1201: This username is already in use.
validation.400-1202: This email address is already in use.
validation.400-5801: Product Name is already in use.
